attributes.action: Make it law for all members of parliament to be randomly/regularly drug tested.
attributes.additional_details:
There is no evidence or background information needed for this. If members of parliament have nothing to hide then they will happily agree to be tested as it will create a little more trust between them and members of the public. 
 There is evidence to show that drugs have found there way into the house of commons if you look for it though.
attributes.background: These people are running our country and making decisions for us and that needs to be done by people who aren't spending their spare time taking drugs or protentially taking drugs while making decisions which could effect us all.
